name: sort-imports
description: Organizes ts/js imports according to our eslint rules

sortImports.sortOrder.description: The sort order to use for import statements. See https://eslint.org/docs/rules/sort-imports

sortImports.multilineImports.enabled.description: When enabled this will rewrite import statements over multiple lines when exceeding sort-imports.multilineImports.maxCharsPerLine

sortImports.multilineImports.quoteSymbol.description: The quote symbol to quote the module name in the import statement

sortImports.multilineImports.maxCharsPer.description: The maximum number of chars for an import statement before making it multi-line

sortImports.multilineImports.fixSrcImpor.description: When enabled it will attempt to fix @binders src import errors like @binders/client/src

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
